website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use lip product that looks pretty and feels nice on your lips – 2 features that are likely to make you forgive that it doesn't wear as long as some other lipsticks by the brand.
pros: A moisturizing formula that provides mid-range color that's not too sheer or too deep
Contains shea and mango butters that make lips feel soft and smooth
Crayon-like applicator is fun to use and easy to control
cons: You may find yourself needing to reapply it throughout the day
Repeat uses say the formula has changed, and isn't quite as moisturizing as the previous version

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Doesn’t last me all day, but normally I only wear lipstick or gloss for right now moments. Glides on easy and stays on a few hours like it need it to. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be my favorite lipstick. It feels nice and creamy and stays on pretty well. This is the only lipstick I am buying now.
customer_reviews.author: bobbiegr

customer_reviews.title: Not The Best!
customer_reviews.text: When this first goes on it is a very nice color. However it does not stay on and is very drying.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gifford

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite brands of lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite brands of lipstick. I love Chubby sticks and this is my favorite brand for it. I also love this specific color because it's tinted but not too bold. I have very fair skin so I think this color looks good on me! I like how it is moisturizing and not very shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and feel. Color does not last and item is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Slater

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for your lips!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color and love how easily it goes on and stays on. It’s not sticky or glossy like some lip colors. The price was better than I’ve seen in any store!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Vanderford

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Pink!
customer_reviews.text: Hazelnut is usually tan or brownish in color. This color is not at all what I expected. Unlikely to be completely used before it gets thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Use every day
customer_reviews.text: Love the creamy feel and ease of application. Great neutral color!
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Color bleeds
customer_reviews.text: This feels nice on the lips however the color ended up bleeding to below my bottom lip. I wish I would have gotten a Matte version.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gruby

customer_reviews.title: My everyday go to lip!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is so moisturizing and perfect for everyday use. Very natural looking but adds just enough for a simple makeup look.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn putnam

customer_reviews.title: Great lip color!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stick and color. This is the first time ever using it and I really like the color and the texture of it. Not dry and not overly slick, just nice and creamy!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Chevalier

customer_reviews.title: Shy of the moisture I needed
customer_reviews.text: The color wasn't as I expected and it also wasn't moisturizing like I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Beautiful color and texture. I really recomend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I got the shade curviest caramel and it is a nice nude for tan, medium skin tones. Very moisturizing and creamy. I did not like the smell but it's not a bad smell either, just a regular lipstick smell...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the feel going on. The downside is that it is gone within an hour or so - both the color and the moisturizing effect. Much is made of its long lasting quality, but it gets a thumbs down from me on that count. At the price it’s an expensive lesson since it isn’t returnable.
customer_reviews.author: J36

customer_reviews.title: Lipstick goes on very easily
customer_reviews.text: I like the moisture in the lipstick goes on so easy and stays on for a few hours! Great price
customer_reviews.author: J. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and very moisturizing. It’s like wearing chapstick but prettier.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Connors

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Had to return item because packaging was a mess and the product was broken in half and jammed up inside the cover. Liked the color though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Spinks

customer_reviews.title: but it's the perfect neutral on a winter skin tone
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it would look too tan, but it's the perfect neutral on a winter skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Techtress88

customer_reviews.title: Love, LOVE the color
customer_reviews.text: Love, LOVE the color. I purchased two. Can't beat Clinque. It doesn't feel heavy and provides just enough color without being too much.
customer_reviews.author: Mpclark

customer_reviews.title: Like and recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like it and highly recommend it for every day look, it hydrates your lips and gives you a beautifut pigmenting color, i like the color so much i am nc35 and it matches my skin tone pirfictly but i think this color will match most of the skin tones.
customer_reviews.author: Dania An

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color for daytime. Accents your lips without shouting "Here I come!" I love the Chubby sticks, they are easy to use and leave my lips nice and moist. I buy the Intense colors, because I like the increased pigment. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Liley

customer_reviews.title: Color is kind of weak
customer_reviews.text: This might be a nude for someone with light skin to the beige side. It's too light for me because I'm tan. I should've returned it, but didn't and don't know if I can once I have used it 3 or 4 times. I was also fooled because they call it "chubby stick." It's not substantial like the more matte finish of the original Chubby Stick which I had a love/hate relationship with (because it was "perfect" other than that it broke off or got ground away).
customer_reviews.author: Lopo

customer_reviews.title: This product is easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to apply, easy to carry in purse. I think I would have liked it more if I had tried a different color hence the reason for only 3 stars. Goes on easily, stays moist and last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: sharpasice

customer_reviews.title: WHY did I buy this?
customer_reviews.text: In answer to my (rhetorical) question, I bought this to replace my Mega Melon Chubby Stick as well as to get a Clinique gift with purchase bonus from Macy's. I had really high hopes for the 'Intense' line, but honestly most of the line is too bright pink and red, and Curviest Caramel is unfortunately too nude for my olive skin. I'll wear it, and use it to build on with other colors, but again - TOO NUDE!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Escape Artist

customer_reviews.title: Intensely...Nude
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Clinique Chubbby Sticks and Curviest Caramel is a great color on me. My skin is pale and my lips are a little pink. Curviest Caramel adds a bit of a nude color. Based on the "Intense" name, I really don't find the color to be intense at all, but it is a very flattering color for me. The Balm feels a bit like a lipstick and keeps my lips feeling moisturized for a few hours. I've tried a few different colors in Chubby Stick Intense and Curviest Caramel has been my favorite so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie B.

product_meta.title: Clinique Chubby Stick Intense Moisturizing Lip Color Balm, No. 01 Curviest Caramel, 0.1 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:No. 01 Curviest CaramelTempt lips with a soft cushion of color that's not quite sheer, not quite opaque-just the perfect happy medium. Loaded with mango and shea butters so lips feel comfortably soft and smooth.
feature_bullets: Tempt lips with a soft cushion of color that's not quite sheer, not quite opaque-just the perfect happy medium
Loaded with mango and shea butters so lips feel comfortably soft and smooth

specifications.Department: Clinique Chubby Stick Moisturizing Lip Colour Balm
